City Council
------------



***City Council***

Mayor- Billy Carlton
Mayor Pro-Tem- Robert Lavy
Alderwoman- Melissa Roberson
Alderman- Mike Scott
Alderman- Mark Hill

Elections are held in May of every year, unless candidates are unopposed and the election is cancelled.

The City Council meets the 2nd Monday of every month @ 7 p.m. at the City Hall Council Chambers, 101 N. Main, Henrietta, TX.
